text: 9:11-12 Jenesis 25:23God arazir a zurara amimɨn gɨn ghua, gumazamiziba uan nɨghnɨzimɨn me ginabi. A gumazamizibar ingangarim bagha nɨghnɨzir pu. Puvatɨ. A uabɨ men diava me ginabi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ Rebeka tɨghar otarir pumuning batamin dughiamɨn, aning arazir kuratam o arazir aghuim gamizir puvatɨzɨ, God kamaghɨn Rebeka mɨgei, “Otarir faragha irɨzim, otarir gɨn irɨzimɨn ingangarir gumazimɨn mɨn ikiam.”
